alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 4:28AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...VERY WINDY CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS THE SOUTHEAST WYOMING WIND PRONE AREAS THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... West winds between 25 to 35 MPH with gusts up to 50 MPH early this morning are expected to slowly increase through noon today. Although wind gusts should remain between 50 to 55 MPH through most of this day, brief gusts of 60 MPH are possible around Arlington and the Interstate 80 Summit. Those traveling in light weight and high profile vehicles are urged to use caution along Interstate 80 between Rawlins and Cheyenne today.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
